name: Grim Tales Server Mod
description:
Server Mod for Grim Tales server.
-Balances all weapons and armor to DLC levels, removes special effects.
-Pacifies pets and thralls.
-Adds recipes for EE/DMT items.
-Adds some new items.
-Adds thrall recipes to players.
changeNote:
-Added special effects of sandstorm and underwater masks back
-Removed rigid accessories (muzzle and third eye)
author: Grim Tales
